View Forecast

 

  • View Forecast
    • Filters
    • Field Description

The View Forecast page allows you to review forecast used to calculate the allocation requirements.

 

Below are some of the details which you will be able to review on this page:

  • Lifecycle forecast of the product or style

  • Profile of the forecast

  • Configure thresholds for accepted forecasts

  • Inputs used to calculate the forecast

  • Historical sales compared to historical forecast

  • Overall sales performance compared to forecast

  • Forecast or sales by fulfillment type

  • Aggregate level (product and location) forecast and sales or demand data
